channel.title: Client just shuts down?
channel.description:
Im using one of Delta Scapes clients, for one of their sources (as a base) and when I run the client I get this message: [code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.method367(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java:80) at client.method22(client.java:526) at client.method54(client.java:2407) at client.method53(client.java:2355) at client.method62(client.java:2798) at client.method7(client.java:1865) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4263) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code] Then the client just closes. No warning or anything, it just shuts down. I had to run the client through Net Beans IDE in order to see what the hell was happening... What does this mean??? I sent a friend the client and it worked just fine for him... I even reinstalled JDK 1.6.0_16 w/ Netbeans Environment Variables are set as (Under System Variables [b]NOT[/b] User Variables) : Path:
;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;.
CLASSPATH:
;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;.%CLASSPATH%
My OS is Windows Vista Ultimate 64-bit. The client used to run fine, but then I tried it again and this started happening. Any help would be GREATLY appreciated... Thanks!

item.title: Client just shuts down?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The cache is not correct. As in, its too many versions ahead of the client. Delta uses 317, and i want to say it loads a 377 cache but no guarantee. Umm, yea thats what that would be, UNLESS (i recomment trying to first) in run.bat change -Xmx500m to -Xmx1500m.

Read full topic

item.title: Client just shuts down?
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Make sure you have the most updated java. Try re-downloading and extracting the folder. That is all I can think of.

Read full topic

item.title: Client just shuts down?
item.dc:creator: @Foomanshoo Foomanshoo
item.description:
@Foomanshoo wrote:

@ECHO OFF Title Fooscape Client v3.0 echo This client was based off of the DeltaScape client, echo and was modified by Foo. JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Thats Run.bat[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2009, 11:47:57 am[/size][hr]Anybody help at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Client just shuts down?
item.dc:creator: @Foomanshoo Foomanshoo
item.description:
@Foomanshoo wrote:

Im using one of Delta Scapes clients, for one of their sources (as a base)

and when I run the client I get this message:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.method367(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java:80) at client.method22(client.java:526) at client.method54(client.java:2407) at client.method53(client.java:2355) at client.method62(client.java:2798) at client.method7(client.java:1865) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4263) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Then the client just closes. No warning or anything, it just shuts down. I had to run the client through Net Beans IDE in order to see what the hell was happening…

What does this mean???

I sent a friend the client and it worked just fine for him… I even reinstalled JDK 1.6.0_16 w/ Netbeans

Environment Variables are set as (Under System Variables NOT User Variables) :

Path:

;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;.

CLASSPATH:

;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;.%CLASSPATH%

My OS is Windows Vista Ultimate 64-bit.

The client used to run fine, but then I tried it again and this started happening.

Any help would be GREATLY appreciated… Thanks!

Read full topic
